entry.title: Russia Pursues Gains in Ukraine's East as Kyiv Eyes Southern Counterblow
entry.content: Ukraine said Russia was deploying tanks, artillery and jet fighters to support an advance on the cities of Bakhmut and Avdiivka, setting its sights on territory still under Ukrainian control in the Donetsk region.

entry.title: Beijing Simulates Attack on Taiwan as Chinese Exercises Extend Into Third Day
entry.content: Chinese military aircraft and ships crossed the halfway mark of the Taiwan Strait, in a simulated land strike on the self-governing island that Beijing claims as its own.

entry.title: Moscow's Invasion Pushes Ukrainians to Ditch Russian, Learn Ukrainian
entry.content: Ukraineâ€™s official tongue, once derided as the language of uneducated villagers, is gaining popularity in Kyiv and other cities where residents who grew up speaking Russian now want to sever linguistic ties.
